body:
The next step is to determine the ability score modifier quality for your race. In many ways, choosing this quality is one of the most important choices when creating a new race, as it determines many of the native abilities of that race.

With the exception of the human heritage modifier quality, when you choose a race's ability score modifiers, you are choosing what ability scores are modified for every member of that race. Only the human heritage modifier quality allows individual members to decide which ability score is modified during character creation.

Most of the ability score modifier qualities divide ability scores into two broad categories that each represent three of the six abilities: physical (Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution) and mental (Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma).

With the exception of the human heritage modifier quality, bonuses granted to ability scores with one of these qualities count as racial bonuses for the purpose of qualifying for racial trait prerequisites.
name: Ability Score Modifier Quality
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality

sections.body: Prerequisites: Advanced or monstrous power level; Modifiers: Pick either mental or physical ability scores. Members of this race gain a +2 bonus to all of those scores, a +4 bonus to one score of the other type, and a –2 penalty to one other ability score of the other type.
sections.name: Advanced
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Advanced

sections.body: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus to any two ability scores.
sections.name: Flexible
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Flexible

sections.body: Members of this race gain a +4 bonus to one ability score, a –2 penalty to one physical ability score, and a –2 penalty to one mental ability score.
sections.name: Greater Paragon
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Greater Paragon

sections.body: Pick either mental or physical ability scores. Members of this race take a –4 penalty to one of those ability scores, a –2 penalty to another of those ability scores, and a +2 bonus to the other ability score.
sections.name: Greater Weakness
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Greater Weakness

sections.body: Prerequisites: Human subtype; Modifiers: Members of this race gain a +2 to any single ability score of your choice during character creation.
sections.name: Human Heritage
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Human Heritage

sections.body: Pick either mental or physical ability scores. Members of this race gain a +2 bonus to one ability score of that type and a –2 penalty to another ability score of that type. They also gain a +2 bonus to one ability score of the other type and a –4 penalty to another ability score of the other type.
sections.name: Mixed Weakness
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Mixed Weakness

sections.body: Members of this race gain a +4 bonus to a single ability score, and a –2 penalty to either all physical or all mental ability scores. If the bonus is to a single physical ability score, the penalties apply to all mental ability scores, and vice versa.
sections.name: Paragon
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Paragon

sections.body: Pick either mental or physical ability scores. Members of this race gain a +2 bonus to two ability scores of the chosen type, and a –2 penalty to one ability score of the other type.
sections.name: Specialized
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Specialized

sections.body: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus to one physical ability score, a +2 bonus to one mental ability score, and a –2 penalty to any other ability score.
sections.name: Standard
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Standard

sections.body: Members of this race gain a +2 bonus to one physical ability score, a +2 bonus to one mental ability score, and a –4 penalty to any other ability score.
sections.name: Weakness
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Qualities/Ability Score Modifier Quality/Weakness
